attributes.action: Allow all Tier 4 households to be able to mix on Christmas Day in England
attributes.additional_details: After what has been a thoroughly rubbish year that has pushed so many people to their limit - the plans that people have made after so many weeks has destroyed the mental health of so many people. 1 day of mixing should be allowed!
attributes.background: To allow all households in Tier 4 to mix with one other household on Christmas Day like they are allowed to in the majority of GB

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
